name.description: Exact product name or model designation.

release_year.description: Four-digit release year if known; otherwise null.

manufacturer.description: Company that manufactured/released the computer; null if unknown.

keywords.description: 3–7 topical terms directly related to this product.

tech_specs.description: Key–value spec sheet. Use strings or arrays for multi-values.

description.description: Main factual text about this exact product (≈150–200 words). Exclude rivals, comparisons, and later variants.

hallmark.description: Defining feature or quality that made the product distinctive or memorable.

summary.description: Objective 1–3 sentence factual summary; no opinions.

evidence.description: At least one item naming the field it supports with a short source quote if available.

target_entity.description: Canonical name of the main product selected on multi-entity pages.

warnings.description: Optional notes like 'rival models mentioned; trimmed'.
